events.title: Music Festival
events.description: Join us for a weekend of non-stop music, featuring top artists from around the world. Dance the night away under the stars.
features: Multiple stages with different music genres

events.title: Theater Festival
events.description: Immerse yourself in the world of Shakespeare with captivating performances of his timeless plays.
features: Food and drinks inspired by the Bard's era

events.title: Film Premieres Week
events.description: Be the first to watch the latest blockbusters and indie gems at our exclusive film premieres.

events.title: Comedy Extravaganza
events.description: Prepare to laugh out loud as top comedians deliver their funniest jokes and stories on stage.

events.title: Rock Legends Reunion
events.description: Get ready for a rock 'n' roll extravaganza as legendary rock bands reunite on stage for an unforgettable night of music and nostalgia.

events.title: Jazz & Blues Night
events.description: Get lost in the soulful rhythms of jazz and blues at this musical extravaganza.
features: Live performances by legendary jazz and blues artists
